Merced.Merced College:
Merced College is a community college located in Merced, California.


== History of Merced College ==
In 1961, the Merced High and LeGrand High School Districts petitioned the State Board of Education for permission to set an election to approve the establishment of a junior college district in Merced County. The State Board of Education approved the proposal for the Merced County Junior College on November 10, 1961.
